definition: see 謎兒|谜儿[mei4 r5], riddle
riddles written on lanterns (e.g. for the Lantern Festival at the end of Chinese New Year)
Spring lantern riddles (guessing game at Lantern Festival 元宵節|元宵节, at the end of Spring festival 春節|春节)

sentences.english: Alas, there’s no audio commentary so the offside rule remains a mystery.
sentences.chinese: 唉，因爲沒有現場語音解說，越位判定仍然是一個謎。

sentences.english: But how the human body is able to sense a one-degree change in temperature has remained a mystery.
sentences.chinese: 但人體如何感知一度的溫度變化仍是個謎。

sentences.english: The formation of lunar rilles remains a mystery.
sentences.chinese: 月球山谷的形成仍是一個謎。

sentences.english: Examples : a) The deeper meaning of the poem remains a puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 這首詩的深層寄義仍是個謎。

sentences.english: Womon is a puzzle itself in its genda.
You can't get specific because the flagstone will act as a jig saw puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 因爲你不能得到具體石板將作爲夾具看到謎。

sentences.english: After that , what happened to the Amber Room remains a mystery .
sentences.chinese: 從那以後，琥珀屋的去處便成了一個謎。

sentences.english: As such, he came to be regarded as a Jedi of mystery, an unapproachable enigma.
sentences.chinese: 因此，他被看作一個神祕的絕地，一個無法接近的謎。

sentences.english: The reason why grass is green was once a mystery to the little boy.
sentences.chinese: 對阿誰小男孩來說草爲什麼是綠的曾經是個謎。

sentences.english: Why the squirrel would want to kill the bat is a mystery.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼這隻松鼠想要殺死那隻蝙蝠是一個謎。

sentences.english: The physical origin of the gauge transformation is a mystery .
sentences.chinese: 這個規範變換的物理起因還是個謎。

sentences.english: This leads to a secretive manner, or even an attitude of completely absorbed enjoyment.
sentences.chinese: 於是以詭祕狀的形式，甚至欣賞其中謎一般的情緒。

sentences.english: This mystery can be understood when we realize how men and women keep score differently.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們知道男女不同的記分法，這個謎就解開了。

sentences.english: " Just a man I know, " she said enigmatically.
sentences.chinese: 只是一個我認識的人，“她謎一般地說著。

sentences.english: The death of the inn-keeper still remains a mystery.
sentences.chinese: 客棧老闆之死仍然是個謎。

sentences.english: And in human civilizations, dreams have always been regarded as a mystery.
sentences.chinese: 在人類文明史上，夢始終被人們視爲一個謎。

definition: to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly
dawn/daybreak/to know/to let sb know/to make explicit
to hide/to conceal/to mask/to shelter/to harbor (i.e. keep sth hidden)/to hide oneself/to lie low/to nestle/hidden/implicit/private/covert/recessed (lighting)
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
